text: ST. LOUIS, Oct.  16, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) will release its third quarter 2019 financial results after market close on Wednesday, October 30, 2019.
title: Aegion Corporation Sets Date to Announce Third Quarter 2019 Financial Results

text: Aegion's (AEGN) Insituform unit wins two-year wastewater pipeline rehabilitation contract in Miami-Dade County.
title: Aegion's Contract Winning Spree Continues, Wins $6.9M Deal

text: ST. LOUIS, Oct.  09, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) today announced that its subsidiary, Insituform Technologies, LLC, has been awarded a two-year term contract valued at $6.9 million from Miami-Dade County in Florida. The contract includes an option for the county to renew for an additional two years on a yearly basis.
title: Aegion Corporation Awarded $6.9 Million Two-Year Wastewater Pipeline Rehabilitation Contract in Miami-Dade County

text: Aegion (AEGN) continues to win wastewater rehabilitation contracts, thereby boosting the Infrastructure Solutions business.
title: Aegion's Wastewater Restoration Deal Win Boosts CIPP Business

text: ST. LOUIS, Sept.  30, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) today announced that its subsidiary, Insituform Technologies, LLC, has been awarded a $15.7 million contract  in Georgia to rehabilitate more than 22 miles of small-, medium- and large-diameter wastewater pipelines using Insituform® cured-in-place pipe (CIPP), primarily in residential areas. Insituform expects to begin the work in October 2019 and complete the project within 12 months.
title: Aegion Corporation Awarded $15.7 Million Wastewater Pipeline Rehabilitation Project in Georgia

text: Aegion (AEGN) is set to renovate wastewater pipelines in Michigan.
title: Aegion's Unit to Rehabilitate Michigan's Wastewater Pipelines

text: SAINT LOUIS, Mo., Sept.  24, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) today announced that its subsidiary, Insituform Technologies, LLC, has been awarded a $9.1 million contract to rehabilitate more than 11,000 feet of 30- to 72-inch diameter wastewater pipelines in Michigan. Insituform will also rehabilitate sewer siphons, manholes, siphon chambers and a junction chamber. This region has a proactive sewer rehabilitation program and Insituform has worked in this area for more than 10 years.
title: Aegion Corporation Awarded $9.1 Million Wastewater Pipeline Rehabilitation Contract in Michigan

text: SAINT LOUIS, Mo., Sept.  18, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) today announced that its subsidiary, Insituform Technologies, LLC, has been awarded a $9.3 million contract from the Metro Wastewater Reclamation District (MWRD) in Denver, Colorado to rehabilitate more than 14,000 feet of 8- to 90-inch diameter wastewater pipelines. Insituform expects to begin the work in September 2019 and complete the project within twelve months.
title: Aegion Corporation Awarded $9.3 Million Wastewater Pipeline Rehabilitation Project in Denver, Colorado

text: Aegion's (AEGN) latest contract win from Baltimore County is going to strengthen the Infrastructure Solutions segment.
title: Aegion to Restore Wastewater Pipelines in Baltimore County

text: ST. LOUIS, Sept.  16, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) today announced that its subsidiary, Insituform Technologies, LLC, has been awarded a wastewater pipeline rehabilitation contract valued at $6.9 million from Baltimore County, Maryland.
title: Aegion Corporation Awarded $6.9 Million Wastewater Pipeline Rehabilitation Contract in Baltimore County, Maryland

text: Aegion's (AEGN) United Special Technical Services receives two Tite Liner system contracts for the rehabilitation of Seawater Transport pipelines in the Middle East.
title: Aegion (AEGN) Wins Two Tite Liner System Contracts, Stock Up

text: ST. LOUIS, Sept.  11, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) today announced that United Special Technical Services, LLC ("USTS"), a joint venture between United Pipeline Systems, Inc., a subsidiary of Aegion ("United"), and Special Technical Services LLC ("STS") of Oman, was awarded two contracts with a combined value of approximately $11 million (USD) from local contractors working for a large oil and gas pipeline operator in Saudi Arabia. United owns a 51 percent interest in the joint venture.
title: Aegion Corporation Awarded Two Tite Liner® System Contracts in the  Middle East Totaling Approximately $11 Million

text: ST. LOUIS, Sept.  10, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aegion Corporation (NASDAQ:AEGN) announced today its President and Chief Executive Officer, Charles R. Gordon, will present at the D.A. Davidson Annual Diversified Industrials & Services Conference in Chicago on Thursday, September 19, 2019. A live webcast of Mr. Gordon’s presentation will occur at approximately 11:05 a.m. Central Time. The webcast will be available through Aegion’s website at  https://www.aegion.com/investor/financial-news-resources/webcasts .
title: Aegion Corporation to Present at the D.A. Davidson Annual Diversified Industrials & Services Conference
